column3: Whoa, at some point it seems easier to copy over the RPC tests from master and disable the parts that are not appropriate.\n
Not sure it's appropriate to add dependencies to stable versions. But otoh, it's just tests... (or does this still work with Py2 as well?)\n
No, the qa/ subfolder is not compatible. It is either python2 or python3.\n

> Not sure it's appropriate to add dependencies to stable versions. But otoh, it's just tests...

It's a bit of a grey area, but yes it's "just tests", and in addition to that I think the fact that the RPC tests are never invoked by the build system makes this acceptable.
